dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint from Linda Ellis
dmca.body:
Hello,
 

Below is my good faith statement and copyright information.  Several sites
hosted by blogspot.com have my copyrighted work, "The Dash" posted
unauthorized and mostly unaccredited.
 

Please have your users remove this material immediately.  I thank you for
your prompt attention to this matter.
 

Linda Ellis
www.lindaellis.net
 

 

 

INFORMATION AS REQUESTED CONCERNING A COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT OF MY WORK BY
MANY OF YOUR MEMBERS:
 

 

1. A description of the copyrighted work or other intellectual property
that you claim has been infringed;
 

Poem titled Only One Childhood, a registered copyrighted work included in "The Dash and Other Poems by Linda Ellis".
 

2. A description of the location where the material that you claim is
infringing is located;
 

The poem is posted unauthorized and mostly unaccredited on the
blogspot.com
sites listed at the end of this email.
 

3. A statement by you that you have a good faith belief that the reported
use is not authorized by the copyright or intellectual property owner, its
agent, or the law;
 

I hereby state that permission was never granted for use of this
copyrighted
work on the web sites sent here by myself, the author and copyright owner,
or any agents or representatives of my company, Linda's Lyrics.
 

4. Your address, telephone number, and, if available, e-mail address;
 

Linda Ellis
Linda's Lyrics
1050 E. Piedmont Road
Suite E-135
Marietta, GA  30062
lellis@bellsouth.net
404-966-3349
 

5. A statement by you, made under penalty of perjury, that the above
information is accurate and that you are the copyright or intellectual
property owner or authorized to act on the copyright or intellectual
property owner's behalf; and
 

Under penalty of perjury, I hereby state that the above information is
accurate and that I am the copyright owner of the material posted
unaccredited and unauthorized on the web sites contained in this email.
 

6. An electronic or physical signature by the person making the submission
(i.e., you or such other person authorized to act on behalf of the
complaining party).  If the submission is made electronically, the
authorized person making the submission should designate his or her
electronic signature by typing a forward slash ("/") before and after his
or
her typed name and follow this electronic signature by again typing his or
her name.
 

 

 

 

 

 

Linda's Lyrics
1050 E. Piedmont Road
Suite E-135
Marietta, GA  30062 www.lindaellis.net
www.lindaslyrics.com
www.thedash.net
 

 

 

My poems appears unaccredited here:
 

  http://www.single-moms-time.blogspot.com/
 

 
Only One Childhood
